page.title: 03Clubs
page.content: Sea Cadets. Some children from our school are members of the Sea Cadet T.S. Prince of Wales.There are various activities that are offered to members, such as band,canoeing,swimming and football. The band practise for the area finals and if they are successful they then proceed to the National finals that will be held in Scarborough.There are trophies for the best drum section ,the best drum major,and the best buglar. There are two trophies that the unit will be competing for this year,the Stephenson Trophy for the best unit in Gwynedd and the Canada Trophy for the top unit in Britain.
